total_input_bytes.value.command: opennop show stats in_dedup | grep -v '-' | sed -n '2p' | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f2

total_output_bytes.value.command: opennop show stats in_dedup | grep -v '-' | sed -n '3p' | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f2

ipt_total_input_bytes.value.command: iptables -t mangle -nvx -L PREROUTING | tr -s ' ' | grep '192.168.0.2 192.168.1.2 tcp spt:80' | awk '{print$2}'

ipt_total_output_bytes.value.command: iptables -t mangle -nvx -L POSTROUTING | tr -s ' ' | grep '192.168.0.2 192.168.1.2 tcp spt:80' | awk '{print$2}'

total_input_bytes.value.command: opennop show stats out_dedup | grep -v '-' | sed -n '2p'| tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f2

total_output_bytes.value.command: opennop show stats out_dedup | grep -v '-' | sed -n '3p'| tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f2

ipt_total_input_bytes.value.command: iptables -t mangle -nvx -L PREROUTING | tr -s ' ' | grep '192.168.1.2 192.168.0.2 tcp dpt:80' | awk '{print$2}'

ipt_total_output_bytes.value.command: iptables -t mangle -nvx -L POSTROUTING | tr -s ' ' | grep '192.168.1.2 192.168.0.2 tcp dpt:80' | awk '{print$2}'
